languages.text: "Не могу знать, Ваша светлость! Вероятно, он..." {n}Блюститель боязливо косится на Абеляра.{/n} "Вероятно, вы найдете его в тронном зале, где господин губернатор планирует провести суд над господами Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Не могу знать, Ваша светлость! Вероятно, он..." {n}Стражник боязливо косится на Абеляра.{/n} "Вероятно, вы найдете его в тронном зале, где господин губернатор планирует провести суд над господами Версериан".

languages.text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."
languages.original_text: "Не могу знать, Ваша светлость! Вероятно, он..." {n}Блюститель боязливо косится на Абеляра.{/n} "Вероятно, вы найдете его в тронном зале, где господин губернатор планирует провести суд над господами Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps, he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the Governor plans to hold a trial against House Werserian."

"I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps, he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the Governor plans to hold a trial against House Werserian."

"I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps, he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the Governor plans on holding a trial against House Werserian."

"I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps, he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the Governor plans on holding a trial against House Werserian."

"I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

"I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

languages.text: 「わかりません、陛下！おそらくですが、総督は…」{n}警備兵は恐る恐るアベラルドを見る。{/n}「王座の間におられるはずです。総督は、そちらでウェルザリアン家を裁判にかけるつもりです」
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: 「わかりません、陛下！おそらくですが、総督は…」{n}警備兵は恐る恐るアベラルドを見る。{/n}「王座の間におられるはずです。総督は、そちらでウェルザリアン家を裁判にかけるつもりです」

languages.text: “我不知道，大人！或许他正在……”{n}卫兵畏惧地看着阿贝拉德。{/n}“您或许可以在王座大厅里找到总督大人，他准备在那里对韦尔森家族进行审判。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道，大人！或许他正在……”{n}卫兵畏惧地看着阿贝拉德。{/n}“您或许可以在王座大厅里找到总督大人，他准备在那里对韦尔森家族进行审讯。”

languages.text: « Je l'ignore, Votre Seigneurie ! Peut-être qu'il... » {n}dit-il avant de s'interrompre en jetant un regard apeuré à Abélard.{/n} « Vous le trouverez probablement dans la salle du trône. Le gouverneur a l'intention de tenir un procès contre la maison Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ignore, Votre Seigneurie ! Peut-être qu'il... {n}dit-il avant de s'interrompre en jetant un regard apeuré à Abélard.{/n} Vous le trouverez probablement dans la salle du trône. Le gouverneur a l'intention de tenir un procès contre la maison Werserian. »

languages.text: «No sé, mi{mf|lord|lady}, quizás...». {n}El guardia mira a Abelard.{/n} «Es probable que esté en la sala del trono; ahí es donde pretende el gobernador celebrar el juicio contra la casa Werserian».
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: «No sé, mi{mf|lord|lady}, quizás...». {n}El guardia mira a Abelard.{/n} «Es probable que esté en la sala del trono, donde el gobernador quiere celebrar el juicio contra la casa Werserian».

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Vielleicht ist er..." {n}Die Wache wirft Abelard einen verängstigten Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr findet ihn vermutlich im Thronsaal, wo der Gouverneur einen Prozess gegen Haus Werserian abhalten will."
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Vielleicht ist er..." {n}Die Wache wirft Abelard einen verängstigten Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr findet ihn vermutlich im Thronsaal, wo der Gouverneur einen Prozess gegen Haus Werserian abhalten will."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, inanın bilmiyorum! Belki..." {n}Muhafız, Abelard'a korkulu gözlerle bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kendisini muhtemelen taht odasında bulacaksınız. Sayın vali, Werserian Hanesi'ni orada yargılayacaktı."
languages.original_text: "I do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Perhaps he is..." {n}The guard throws a fearful gaze at Abelard.{/n} "You can probably find him in the throne room, where the governor intends to put House Werserian on trial."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, inanın bilmiyorum! Belki..." {n}Muhafız, Abelard'a korkulu gözlerle bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Kendisini muhtemelen taht odasında bulacaksınız. Vali efendi Werserian Hanesi'ni orada yargılayacakmış."
